task.summary: Default task
first commit, a working version of three tables that are connected to mysql db and the list action works but update/delete/add operations are not supported in backend
after some directory cleanup, started working on reviewer/manuscript crud table
implement reloading review table based on the mansucript selected
clean up directories and change css to match newest press theme
adding all the related files to the project
just to pass the code to Maryse
ability to download manuscript from the last column on manuscript table is added and tested
edit reviewer/author was tested successfullly. column sorting for author and reviewer table is added. pagination fixed for all tables
fixed compile errors caused by previous push.
after initial testing, all functionalities of the administrator page are implemented except for the notification panel which is going to be added later
added notification tab with working add/remove functionality
after adding notification tab, in the middle of finishing myreview page
fix showing table with new changes in tables
fixed problem with sidebar on my review page
changed main width back to 100% and sidebar height to 100% as well
set main height to 100% as well

fixed ordering of manuscript and saving new manuscript
fixed db address plus removing duplicate jquery lib from side menues
after testing email notification successfully
duplicate reviewer assignment check

fixing the remove manuscript functionality
fixed column size for note and added phone numbers and column sorting
